channel.title: Shippings on Direct Charity
channel.description: Recent content in Shippings on Direct Charity

item.title: Ship Books using Meest
item.description: Ship Books Using Meest 1. Pack the box Use box size 16x16x16 inches aiming for ~65 pounds weight. Heavier items like books will pack to ~85% of the total available volume. Tape the outside bottom of the box generously covering the middle seam completely. Put a layer or two of cardboard on the inside bottom of the box. This greatly reduces the chance that the bottom may spill during delivery. Count the number of books as you place them inside.

item.title: Ship Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
item.description: Ship Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine using Meest 1. Collect items Warm children’s clothing are frequently requested items. Used clothes are preferred. Meest asks not to mix used and new clothes in the same shipment. Raid your local Good Will! Please, select things of good quality. Natural fibers, like wool and cotton, have better thermal qualities than synthetic fibers, like polyester or nylon. Here is a basic set for children ages 3-16, a suggestion:
